title: YMCA Campers Mistaken For Migrant Kids Headed For Detention
teaser: Protesters in Oracle, Ariz., are concerned about migrant children reaching the U.S. State Rep. Adam Kwasman says he saw a yellow bus full of kids, their faces full of fear. The kids were campers.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
